member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Dns.MXRecord
member.summary: Represents a DNS MX (Mail eXchanger) record.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Dns.MXRecord.Name
member.summary: The DNS MX record name.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Dns.MXRecord.Preference
member.summary: The DNS MX record preference.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.ComponentException
member.summary: The base type for specific exceptions thrown by the component.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.LicenseException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the component detects an invalid license.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpMessage
member.summary: Represents a message exchanged (sent or received) during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpCommand
member.summary: Represents a command sent from the component to an external mail exchanger, during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpCommand.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the message.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpCommand.RawLine
member.summary: Gets the raw line of the message, as sent by the component.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskStartedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the VerificationTaskStarted event of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskStartedEventArgs.Task
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address verification task which has been started.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskStartedEventArgs.UserState
member.summary: Gets a unique user state, useful to solve synchronization issues.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskStartedEventArgs.GeneratedOn
member.summary: Returns the generation date and time of the related event.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskStartedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the VerificationTaskStarted event of the EmailVerifier class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A VerificationTaskStartedEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier
member.summary: Verifies e-mail addresses using different techniques and accuracy levels.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.VerifyAsync(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask)
member.summary: Verifies an e-mail address in a new thread using a VerificationTask, where both inputs and outputs appear.
member.param: A VerificationTask containing both inputs and, after the VerificationTaskCompleted event fires, the outputs of the verification process.
member.remarks: This method raises the VerificationTaskCompleted event when the verification completes, even if it was not successfull or an error occured.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.CancelAsync(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask)
member.summary: Gracefully cancels a pending asynchronous verification started with the VerifyAsync method.
member.param: The VerificationTask to cancel.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.BeginVerify(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Begins an asynchronous verification of the given VerificationTask, up to the specified level.
member.remarks: This method uses the IAsyncResult pattern for anynchronous purposes; to use an event-based pattern please see the VerifyAsync method and its overloads.
member.param: A VerificationTask containing both inputs and, after the asynchronous execution completes, the outputs of the verification process.
The method that is executed when the execution performed by BeginVerify completes.
An object that contains any additional user-defined data.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous call.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.EndVerify(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Handles the end of an asynchronous verification started with the BeginVerify method.
member.remarks: This method uses the IAsyncResult pattern for anynchronous purposes; to use an event-based pattern please see the VerifyAsync method and its overloads.
member.param: An IAsyncResult that represents the asynchronous call to end.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EmailVerifier class and sets up default settings values.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.#ctor(System.ComponentModel.IContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the EmailVerifier class with a container and sets up default settings values.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.Verify(System.String,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel)
member.summary: Verifies an e-mail address up to the given level.
member.param: The e-mail address to verify.
A VerificationLevel specifing the required level of verification.
member.returns: A VerificationResult which contains a detailed result and status of the verification, information about external mail exchangers and detected errors, if any.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.Verify(Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask)
member.summary: Verifies an e-mail address using a VerificationTask, where both inputs and outputs appear. Using a single unit of data would ease multi-threaded operations and results tracking, while allowing a better event handling.
member.param: A VerificationTask containing both inputs and, after the method call, the outputs of the verification process.

member.name: E:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.VerificationTaskStarted
member.summary: Occurs when the component starts processing a single verification task.

member.name: E:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.VerificationTaskProgressChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a progress change happens while processing a single verification task.

member.name: E:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.VerificationTaskCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when the component finished processing a single verification task.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.RuntimeLicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the runtime license key for the component, used to unlock the component after its tial period expired.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.DnsQueryTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for each DNS query to complete. Queries lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for DNS queries is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.DnsQueryMaxRetriesCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times to retry querying the DNS when a connection failure or a timeout occurs. The default is 3 retries.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.MailboxInspectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the inspection of the mailbox to complete. Inspections lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for mailbox inspection is 60 seconds (1 minute).

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.CatchAllValidationTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the catch-all verification to complete. Verification lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for catch-all verification is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.SmtpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for the SMTP server to accepts a connection. Connection attempts lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for SMTP connections is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.HttpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: The timeout for an external HTTP server to accepts a connection. Connection attempts lasting more than this timeout will be automatically aborted and yield to the failure of the verification. The default timeout for HTTP connections is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.LocalDnsEndPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the local DNS endpoint, used to connect to the configured DNS servers. Default is an endpoint which listens on all available network interfaces.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.LocalSmtpEndPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the local SMTP endpoint, used to connect to external SMTP servers while validating e-mail addresses. Default is an endpoint which listens on all available network interfaces. The enterprise edition of the component allows to change the local SMTP endpoint and possibly cycle among a list of available IP addresses using the LocalSmtpEndPointBinding event.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.LocalHostFqdn
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the local host, used to connect to external SMTP servers while validating e-mail addresses. The default value for this property is the resolved DNS name for the local host.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.LocalSenderAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the local sender email address, used to connect to external SMTP servers while validating e-mail addresses. The default value for this property is postmaster@host, where host is the value retrieved from LocalHostFqdn.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.DnsServers
member.summary: Gets the editable list of IP addresses of the DNS servers used during the verification phase. The default IP addresses are retrieved from the current system configuration.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowDomainLiterals
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows domain literals within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts domain literals.If this value is set to false, every domain literal would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowInternationalDomainNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows international domain names (IDN) labels within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts international domain names.If this value is set to false, every international domain name would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowInternationalMailboxNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows international mailbox names within the e-mail addresses it validates, according to RFC 5336. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts international mailbox names.If this value is set to false, every international mailbox name would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows comments within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts comments.If this value is set to false, every comment would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowQuotedStrings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows quoted strings (and, consequently, quoted pairs) within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts quoted strings (and quoted pairs).If this value is set to false, every quoted string would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.AllowFoldingWhiteSpaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component allows folding white spaces (FWS) within the e-mail addresses it validates. The default value is true, meaning the component accepts folding white spaces.If this value is set to false, every white space would result in a failed verification.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.SameDomainConnectionDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay for SMTP connections made to the same domain. Verifications which employ level Smtp or greater and made to the same domain will wait this interval between a connection and the subsequent, in order to lighten the external server load. The default delay for SMTP connections made to the same domain is 10 seconds.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.EmailVerifier.TreatDisposableFailuresAsFatal
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component will stop validating email addresses that fail while in the Disposable validation level or will keep verifying the upper validation levels as well. The default value is true, meaning that email addresses failing the Disposable Email Address check will make the entire validations fail with the DomainIsWellKnownDea status code.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.ConfigurationException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the component detects invalid data in its configuration.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReply
member.summary: Represents a reply received from an external mail exchanger during an SMTP dialog.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReply.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of all the lines of the reply.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReply.ReplyLines
member.summary: Gets the collection of lines pertaining to the reply.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReply.IsSuccessful
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the reply is successful or not.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine
member.summary: Represents a single line of an SMTP reply.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the SMTP reply line.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.Code
member.summary: Gets the raw SMTP status code of the line.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.MoreLinesFollow
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the component expects one or more lines after this one or not.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.RawLine
member.summary: Gets the raw line of the reply, as received by the external mail exchanger.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpReplyLine.Message
member.summary: Gets the message part of the reply line.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage
member.summary: Specifies the different stages of the SMTP protocol where dialog exceptions may occur.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage.BeforeHelo
member.summary: The first stage of the SMTP dialog, before sending the HELO greeting.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage.Helo
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the HELO command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage.MailFrom
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the MAIL FROM command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage.RcptTo
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the RCPT TO command.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Smtp.SmtpStage.Quit
member.summary: The stage pertaining to the QUIT command.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus
member.summary: Provides enumerated values that specify the supported statuses of an e-mail address verification.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown status, the verification may still be in progress.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnhandledException
member.summary: One or more unhandled exceptions have been thrown during the verification process. Additional information may be retrieved using the Exceptions property collection of the target VerificationResult.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.Success
member.summary: The e-mail address was verified successfully up to the required level.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnmatchedQuotedPair
member.summary: A quoted pair within a quoted word is not closed properly.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnexpectedQuotedPairSequence
member.summary: An unexpected quoted pair sequence has been found within a quoted word.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidWordBoundaryStart
member.summary: A new word boundary start has been detected at an invalid position.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidCharacterInSequence
member.summary: An invalid character has been detected in the provided sequence.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.UnbalancedCommentParenthesis
member.summary: The number of parenthesis used to open comments is not equal to the one used to close them.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DoubleDotSequence
member.summary: An invalid sequence of two adjacent dots has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidLocalPartLength
member.summary: The local part of the e-mail address has an invalid length.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidFoldingWhiteSpaceSequence
member.summary: An invalid folding white space (FWS) sequence has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.AtSignNotFound
member.summary: The at sign symbol (@), used to separate the local part from the domain part of the address, has not been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidEmptyQuotedWord
member.summary: An invalid quoted word with no content has been found.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.InvalidAddressLength
member.summary: The email address has an invalid total length.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainPartCompliancyFailure
member.summary: The domain part of the email address is not compliant with the IETF standards.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DnsQueryTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occured while querying the DNS server(s) for records about the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the DnsQueryTimeout property value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DnsConnectionFailure
member.summary: Verification failed because of a socket connection error occured while querying the DNS server.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainDoesNotExist
member.summary: The domain of the e-mail address does not exist.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainIsInexistent
member.summary: Old enum field for DomainDoesNotExist.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.DomainIsWellKnownDea
member.summary: The e-mail address is provided by a well known disposable e-mail address provider (DEA).

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.SmtpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occured while connecting to the mail exchanger which serves the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the SmtpConnectionTimeout property value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.SmtpConnectionFailure
member.summary: A socket connection error occured while connecting to the mail exchanger which serves the e-mail address domain.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxDoesNotExist
member.summary: The mailbox for the e-mail address does not exist.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxConnectionFailure
member.summary: A connection error occurred while validating the mailbox for the e-mail address.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.LocalSenderAddressRejected
member.summary: The external mail exchanger rejected the address specified by the LocalSenderAddress property value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxValidationTimeout
member.summary: A timeout occured while verifying the existence of the mailbox.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the MailboxInspectionTimeout value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.MailboxTemporarilyUnavailable
member.summary: The requested mailbox is temporarily unavailable. This is not an indicator that the mailbox actually exists but, often, a message sent by external mail exchangers with greylisting enabled. To complete the validation of the address you should re-process the verification with a small delay (usually 5-10 minutes), until the server answers with a different message.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.ServerDoesNotSupportInternationalMailboxes
member.summary: The external mail exchanger does not support international mailbox names. To support this feature, mail exchangers must comply with RFC 5336 and support and announce both the 8BITMIME and the UTF8SMTP protocol extensions.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.CatchAllValidationTimeout
member.summary: A timeout occured while verifying fake e-mail address rejection for the mail server.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the CatchAllValidationTimeout value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.ServerIsCatchAll
member.summary: The external mail exchanger accepts fake, non existent, e-mail addresses; therefore the provided e-mail address MAY be inexistent too.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.CatchAllConnectionFailure
member.summary: A connection error occurred while verifying the external mail exchanger rejects inexistent e-mail addresses.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.ProxyConnectionTimeout
member.summary: A timeout occured while connecting to the configured proxy server.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.HttpConnectionTimeout
member.summary: A timeout has occured while connecting to the HTTP server (webmail) which serves the e-mail address domain.
member.remarks: If you receive this status too often try to increase the HttpConnectionTimeout property value of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.HttpConnectionFailure
member.summary: A socket connection error occured while connecting to the HTTP server (webmail) which serves the e-mail address domain.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationStatus.OperationCancelled
member.summary: The asynchronous e-mail address verification was cancelled by using the CancelAsync(VerificationTask) or the CancelAsync(VerificationTaskGroup) methods.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask
member.summary: Describes an e-mail verification process, including the address to verify, the level of verification to reach and its results.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.#ctor(System.String,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a verification task.
member.param: The e-mail address to verify.
The desired level of verification.
A custom object state, useful to solve synchronization issues on the caller.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.#ctor(System.String,Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel)
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of a verification task.
member.param: The e-mail address to verify.
The desired level of verification.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the e-mail address verification task.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address to verify in the task.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.Level
member.summary: Gets the required verification level for the task.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.UserState
member.summary: Gets a custom user state object, useful to solve synchronization issues.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTask.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of the e-mail address verification for the task.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an unexpected SMTP reply from an external mail exchanger is detected.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException.Stage
member.summary: The stage of the SMTP dialog where the exception occurs.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.Exceptions.SmtpDialogException.Reply
member.summary: The SMTP reply which caused the exception to occur.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult
member.summary: Represents the results of the verification for an e-mail address.

member.name: M:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.ToString
member.summary: Returns a textual representation of the Status property.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.Status
member.summary: Gets detailed status information for the verification result.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsSuccess
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the e-mail address verification succeded or failed. In the latter case, detailed failure information is available through Status property value.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsTimeoutFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a timeout occured while verifying the e-mail address, including:
CatchAllValidationTimeout
DnsQueryTimeout
HttpConnectionTimeout
MailboxValidationTimeout
ProxyConnectionTimeout
SmtpConnectionTimeout

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsNetworkFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a failure in the network connection occured while verifying the e-mail address, including:
SmtpConnectionFailure
MailboxConnectionFailure
DnsConnectionFailure
CatchAllConnectionFailure
HttpConnectionFailure

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsSyntaxFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a syntax error in the e-mail address has been found, including:
AtSignNotFound
DomainPartCompliancyFailure
DoubleDotSequence
InvalidAddressLength
InvalidCharacterInSequence
InvalidEmptyQuotedWord
InvalidFoldingWhiteSpaceSequence
InvalidLocalPartLength
InvalidWordBoundaryStart
UnbalancedCommentParenthesis
UnexpectedQuotedPairSequence
UnmatchedQuotedPair

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsDnsFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a DNS-related issue occurred, including:
DnsQueryTimeout
DomainDoesNotExist
DnsConnectionFailure

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsDisposableEmailAddressFailure
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the e-mail address has been provided by a well known disposable e-mail address (DEA) provider.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsSmtpFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a problem with the SMTP validation of the e-mail address occurred, including:
SmtpConnectionFailure
SmtpConnectionTimeout

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsMailboxFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a problem with the mailbox validation of the e-mail address occurred, including:
MailboxConnectionFailure
MailboxDoesNotExist
MailboxTemporarilyUnavailable
MailboxValidationTimeout
ServerDoesNotSupportInternationalMailboxes

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsCatchAllFailure
member.summary:
Gets a value indicating whether a problem with the fake address rejection validation occurred, including:
CatchAllConnectionFailure
CatchAllValidationTimeout
ServerIsCatchAll

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.EmailAddress
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address, without comments and folding white spaces.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.AsciiEmailAddressDomainPart
member.summary: Gets the domain part of the e-mail address, converted to ASCII if needed and with comments and folding white spaces stripped off. The ASCII encoding is performed using the standard punycode algorithm.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.EmailAddressDomainPart
member.summary: Gets the domain part of the e-mail address, without comments and folding white spaces.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.EmailAddressLocalPart
member.summary: Gets the local part of the e-mail address, without comments and folding white spaces.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.HasInternationalMailboxName
member.summary: Gets a logical value indicating whether the email address has an international mailbox name or not.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.HasInternationalDomainName
member.summary: Gets a logical value indicating whether the email address has an international domain name or not.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.SyntaxFailureIndex
member.summary: Gets the position of the character in the email address that eventually caused the syntax validation to fail.
member.remarks: This property returns null when there is not a syntax failure.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.IsDisposableEmailAddress
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the email address comes from a disposable email address provider or not.
member.remarks: This property returns null for validations below the Disposable level.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.CurrentLevel
member.summary: Gets the current level of verification for the result.
member.remarks: During asynchronous verifications, this property value increments until it reaches the required level of verification, an error occurs or the verification fails.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.AvailableMXRecords
member.summary: Returns the DNS MX records found during the verification process.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.UsedMXRecord
member.summary: Returns the DNS MX record which has actually been used by the verification process.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.Exceptions
member.summary: Returns the exceptions thrown during the verification process (useful for debugging purposes).

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationResult.Comments
member.summary: Returns the comments eventually extracted from the email address.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel
member.summary: Provides enumerated values that specify the supported e-mail address verification levels.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Syntax
member.summary: Performs a syntactical validation of the e-mail address against RFC 2821, RFC 2822, RFC 3696 and RFC 5321.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Disposable
member.summary: Checks the domain of the e-mail address against an internal list of well known disposable e-mail address (DEA) providers.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Dns
member.summary: Queries the configured DNS server(s) and looks for records about the e-mail address domain and checks their validity and consistency. The collection of the DNS server(s) the component can query may be inspected and adjusted using the DnsServers property of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Smtp
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address can be contacted using the SMTP protocol.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.Mailbox
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address actually recognizes it as a valid recipient.

member.name: F:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationLevel.CatchAll
member.summary: Checks if the mail exchanger responsible for the e-mail address rejects invalid recipients.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the VerificationTaskCompleted event of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskCompletedEventArgs.Task
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address verification task which has been completed.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskCompletedEventArgs.GeneratedOn
member.summary: Returns the generation date and time of the related event.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskCompletedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the VerificationTaskCompleted event of the EmailVerifier class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A VerificationTaskCompletedEventArgs that contains the event data.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the VerificationTaskProgressChanged event of the EmailVerifier class.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventArgs.Task
member.summary: Gets the e-mail address verification task whose progress has changed.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentLevel
member.summary: Gets the current verification level of the related e-mail address verification task.

member.name: P:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventArgs.GeneratedOn
member.summary: Returns the generation date and time of the related event.

member.name: T:Cobisi.EmailVerify.VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the VerificationTaskProgressChanged event of the EmailVerifier class.
member.param: The source of the event.
A VerificationTaskProgressChangedEventArgs that contains the event data.
